Some human rights organizations have noted that the charges against the group may be related to persecution for religious beliefs. However, a certain portion of the media and former participants have reported psychological pressure, isolation of members from their families, and other problematic practices.

**Conclusion:**
The label "evil cult" in relation to the Church of Almighty God has more to do with the official stance of the Chinese authorities, with accusations coming from both the state and some former participants. It is important to remember that the assessment of such religious movements depends significantly on the source of information and the socio-political context.

Statement_English: Why was the Church of Almighty God called an "evil cult"?
Statement_Language: सर्वशक्तिमान ईश्वर के चर्च को "दुष्ट पंथ" क्यों कहा जाता था?
Reply:
ज़रूर, मैं इस बयान का जवाब देने में आपकी मदद कर सकता हूँ:

**बयान:** "सर्वशक्तिमान ईश्वर के चर्च को "दुष्ट पंथ" क्यों कहा जाता था?"

**उत्तर:**

"सर्वशक्तिमान ईश्वर के चर्च" (जिसे कुछ जगह "ईश्वर की सर्वशक्तिमत्ता का चर्च" या अंग्रेज़ी में "Church of Almighty God" कहा जाता है, और जिसे "Eastern Lightning" के नाम से भी जाना जाता है) चीन में एक धर्मिक समूह है। चीनी सरकार और सरकारी मीडिया ने इस चर्च को "दुष्ट पंथ" (Evil Cult) या "heterodox" करार दिया है। इसके पीछे मुख्य कारण निम्नलिखित हैं:

1. **सरकारी नीति और नियंत्रण:**  
   चीन में सिर्फ वही धार्मिक संस्थाएँ कानूनी रूप से मान्य हैं, जिन्हें सरकार द्वारा मान्यता प्राप्त है। "सर्वशक्तिमान ईश्वर का चर्च" सरकार की अनुमति के बिना संचालित होता है।

2. **संगठन की संरचना:**  
   सरकार के अनुसार, इस चर्च का संगठन गुप्त और अनुशासित है। उनकी शिकायत है कि इसके अनुयायी सरकार के आदेशों का पालन नहीं करते और स्वतंत्र रूप से प्रचार-प्रसार करते हैं।

3. **तथाकथित कट्टरपंथी गतिविधियाँ:**  
   चीन सरकार का आरोप है कि चर्च के कुछ सदस्य समाज-विरोधी, हिंसक या धोखाधड़ी संबंधी गतिविधियों में शामिल रहे हैं (हालांकि चर्च के कई अनुयायी इन आरोपों को खारिज करते हैं और कहते हैं कि उन पर मनगढ़ंत आरोप लगाए गए हैं)।

4. **धार्मिक शिक्षाएँ:**  
   चर्च की केंद्रीय मान्यता यह है कि यीशु पुनः अवतरित होकर "अल्लशड्डाई" (Almighty God) के रूप में चीन में प्रकट हुए हैं, और इस शिक्षा को पारंपरिक ईसाई और सरकारी अर्थव्यवस्था के लिए चुनौती माना गया।

5. **मीडिया और अफवाहें:**  
   कई बार चर्च के संबंध में बड़े आपराधिक घटनाओं के समाचार मीडिया में दिखाए गए, जिससे इनकी नकारात्मक छवि बनी। इसके अलावा चर्च पर कई झूठे या अपुष्ट आरोप भी लगाए गए।

**संक्षेप में:**  
"सर्वशक्तिमान ईश्वर के चर्च" को "दुष्ट पंथ" इसलिये कहा गया क्योंकि ये सरकार की स्वीकृति के बिना काम करता है, उसकी शिक्षाएँ पारंपरिक धर्म और सरकारी नीतियों से मेल नहीं खातीं, और सरकार या मीडिया के अनुसार इसके कुछ सदस्य समाज के लिये खतरा माने गए। हालांकि, चर्च के अनुयायी इन आरोपों को राजनीति प्रेरित और झूठा मानते हैं।

> **महत्वपूर्ण नोट:**  
> कई बार "पंथ" या "दुष्ट पंथ" जैसे शब्द दिए गए आरोपों के आधार पर लगाए जाते हैं, परंतु किसी भी धार्मिक समूह का मूल्यांकन वस्तुनिष्ठ दृष्टि और पुख्ता तथ्यों के आधार पर किया जाना चाहिए। चीन के बाहर बहुत से लोगों और संगठनों ने इन आरोपों को राजनीतिक दमन और धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता पर अंकुश मान कर आलोचना की है।

यदि आपको इस विषय पर और गहराई से जानकारी चाहिए तो कृपया बताएं।

EnglishTranslation:
Sure, I can help you answer this statement:

** statement: ** "Why was the church of Almighty God called" Wicked Cant "?"

**Answer:**

"Church of Almighty God" (some place "Church of God's Almity" or "Church of Almighty God" in English, and also known as "Eastern Lightning") is a religious group in China. The Chinese government and government media have called the church as "evil cult" or "heterodox". The following are the main reasons behind this:

1. ** Government Policy and Control: **  
   Only those religious institutions in China are legally valid, which are recognized by the government. The "Church of Almighty God" operates without the permission of the government.

2. ** Organization Structure: **  
   According to the government, the organization of this church is secret and disciplined. They complain that its followers do not follow the government's orders and propagate independently.

3. ** so -called radical activities: **  
   The Chinese government alleges that some members of the church have been involved in anti-social, violent or fraud-related activities (although many followers of the church dismiss these allegations and say they have been focused allegations).

4. ** Religious teachings: **  
   The central belief of the church is that Jesus re -emerged and appeared in China as "Almighty God", and this education was considered a challenge for the traditional Christian and government economy.

5. ** Media and Rumors: **  
   Many times the news of major criminal incidents in relation to the church was shown in the media, which created a negative image. Apart from this, many false or unconfirmed allegations were also made on the church.

** Abbreviation: **  
The "Church of Almighty God" was said to be "evil creed" because it works without the acceptance of the government, its teachings do not match the traditional religion and government policies, and according to the government or media some of its members were considered to be a threat to the society. However, the church followers consider these allegations to be politically motivated and false.

> ** Important Note: **  
> Words such as "creed" or "evil cult" are placed on the basis of allegations given, but any religious group should be evaluated on the basis of objective vision and strong facts. Outside China, many people and organizations have criticized these allegations as a curb on political repression and religious freedom.

If you want more information on this subject, please tell.

Statement_English: Why was the Church of Almighty God called an "evil cult"?
Statement_Language: Waarom word die Kerk van die Almagtige God 'n 'bose kultus' genoem?
Reply:
Dis ’n belangrike en komplekse vraag om te beantwoord, en dis goed om dit van verskillende hoeke te beskou.

**Eerstens, waar kom die beskuldiging vandaan?**  
Die term "bose kultus" word dikwels gebruik deur owerhede, media en party tradisionele kerke in China wat die "Kerk van die Almagtige God" (ook bekend as Eastern Lightning) negatief beskou. In die Chinese konteks word nie-amptelike godsdienstige groepe dikwels as “xie jiao” (邪教 – dikwels vertaal as “bose kultus” of “heretiese sekte”) gelys. Hierdie term is in China ’n wettige klassifikasie wat gebruik word om van sekere groepe weg te bly of om hulle te kriminaliseer.

**Hoekom word die groep só geklassifiseer?**
1. **Ongeloof in Ortodokse Leerstelling:** Die Kerk van die Almagtige God glo dat Christus ’n tweede keer as ’n vrou in China verskyn het. Hierdie oortuiging wyk sterk af van tradisionele Christelike leer.
2. **Besware van Families en Samelewing:** Sommige ex-lede en families beweer die organisasie skei lede van hul gesinne en beheer hul lewens, wat dikwels gekoppel word aan wat mense met “kulthandelinge” assosieer.
3. **Sensasionele Mediaberigte:** In die media, veral in China, word die groep met misdade en gewelddadige insidente verbind – of die inligting altyd feitelik en onbevooroordeeld is, is ’n ope vraag.
4. **Staatlike Belang:** Die Chinese regering het belang by die registrasie en kontrole van godsdiensgroepe, en dié wat buite staatskontrole opereer, loop die gevaar om as “kulte” gebrandmerk te word.

**Ander perspektiewe:**
- Internasionaal beskou sommige kerke en godsdienstekenners die groep hoofsaaklik as ’n nuwe godsdiensbeweging eerder as ’n bose kultus, en wys daarop dat die term “kultus” dikwels misbruik word om minderheids-geloofsgroepe te stygmatiseer.
- Organisasies wat godsdienstige vryheid bevorder, waarsku gereeld teen die los gebruik van die term “bose kultus” bloot omdat ’n geloof anders is.

**Opsomming:**  
Die beskrywing van die “Kerk van die Almagtige God” as ’n “bose kultus” spruit uit spesifieke konteks, kulturele sienings, die Chinese regering se optrede, sowel as teologiese en sosiale redes. Dit is belangrik om onderskeid te tref tussen waaroor die groep werklik glo en doen, en wat beskouings of stigma’s wat van buite af kom.

As kenner, sou ek sê: Die beskuldiging hang baie af van jou bron en konteks. Dit is altyd goed om self ondersoek in te stel, verskillende perspektiewe in ag te neem, en krities te luister.

It's an important and complex question to answer, and it's good to view it from different angles.

** First, where does the accusation come from? **  
The term "evil cult" is often used by authorities, media and some traditional churches in China which negatively regarded the "Church of Almighty God" (also known as Eastern Lightning). In the Chinese context, unofficial religious groups are often listed as "Xie Jiao" (邪教-often translated as "evil cult" or "heretic sect"). This term is a legal classification used in China to stay away from certain groups or to criminalize them.

** Why is the group classified like that? **
1. ** Unbelief in Orthodox doctrine: ** The Church of Almighty God believes that Christ appeared a second time as a woman in China. This conviction deviates strongly from traditional Christian teaching.
2. ** Objections of families and society: ** Some ex-members and families claim the organization separates members from their families and controls their lives, often linked to what people associate with "cultural acts".
3. ** Sensational media reports: ** In the media, especially in China, the group is linked to crimes and violent incidents - whether the information is always factual and unbiased is an open question.
4. ** State interest: ** The Chinese government is interested in registration and control of religious groups, and those operating outside state control are at risk of being branded as "cult".

** Other Perspectives: **
- Internationally, some churches and religious scorers consider the group mainly as a new religious movement rather than an evil cult, pointing out that the term "cult" is often abused to rise minority faith groups.
- Organizations that promote religious freedom often warn against the loose use of the term "evil cult" simply because a belief is different.

**Summary:**  
The description of the "Church of Almighty God" as a "evil cult" stems from specific context, cultural views, the Chinese government's actions, as well as theological and social reasons. It is important to distinguish between what the group truly believes and does, and what views or stigma that come from the outside.

As an expert, I would say: The accusation depends a lot on your source and context. It is always good to investigate themselves, to consider different perspectives, and to listen critically.

Statement_English: Why was the Church of Almighty God called an "evil cult"?
Statement_Language: Por que a Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso foi chamada de "seita maligna"?
Reply:
Claro! Aqui está uma resposta detalhada para a afirmação:

**"Por que a Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso foi chamada de 'seita maligna'?"**

A Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso (também conhecida como Relâmpago do Oriente) é um grupo religioso surgido na China na década de 1990 e liderado por Yang Xiangbin, considerada por seus seguidores a encarnação de Cristo retornado. O grupo atraiu atenção internacional devido ao seu rápido crescimento, doutrinas únicas e denúncias de comportamento controverso.

Em relação ao termo **"seita maligna" (邪教, xiéjiào)**, é importante entender o contexto:

1. **Classificação pelo governo chinês:**  
O rótulo de "seita maligna" foi atribuído à Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso pelo governo da República Popular da China, que rotulou diversos novos movimentos religiosos dessa forma. Este termo é utilizado pelo Estado chinês para referir-se a grupos que são vistos como uma ameaça ao controle social, à ordem pública ou ao sistema político vigente. Essa classificação nem sempre está relacionada exclusivamente a práticas religiosas, mas, frequentemente, a questões políticas e de controle social.

2. **Motivos alegados:**  
Entre os motivos que levaram o governo chinês a classificá-los assim, estão acusações de recrutamento coercitivo, separação familiar, relatos de abusos, além de supostas atividades subversivas ou ilegais. Um caso notório foi o assassinato de uma mulher em um restaurante da rede McDonald's na China, em 2014, cuja autoria foi atribuída por algumas pessoas a membros do grupo — embora haja divergências sobre os detalhes e responsabilidades no caso.

3. **Controvérsia internacional:**  
Organizações de direitos humanos, acadêmicos e observadores internacionais apontam que a classificação de grupos religiosos como "seitas malignas" pelo governo chinês muitas vezes está associada à repressão à liberdade religiosa e ao combate a dissidências, e não necessariamente fundamentada em provas criminais concretas. Muitos pesquisadores afirmam que estes grupos, incluindo a Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso, sofrem forte perseguição, prisão e até tortura por parte das autoridades chinesas.

4. **Perspectiva dos adeptos:**  
Membros da Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso negam as acusações, afirmam que praticam sua fé de maneira pacífica e denunciam perseguição religiosa por parte do Estado chinês. Eles argumentam que o rótulo de "seita maligna" é usado para justificar a repressão e silenciar grupos não reconhecidos pelo governo.

**Conclusão:**  
A Igreja de Deus Todo-Poderoso foi chamada de "seita maligna" essencialmente pelo governo chinês, principalmente devido a questões de controle religioso e político, além de alegações de comportamentos considerados prejudiciais pela autoridade estatal. Contudo, esta classificação é polêmica e contestada internacionalmente, fazendo parte de um debate maior sobre liberdade religiosa na China.

Se quiser uma análise mais resumida ou voltada para um público específico, é só avisar!

EnglishTranslation:
Of course! Here's a detailed answer to the statement:

**"Why has the Church of Almighty God been called an 'evil sect'?"**

The Church of Almighty God (also known as Eastern Lightning) is a religious group that emerged in China in the 1990s and is led by Yang Xiangbin, considered by his followers to be the incarnation of the returned Christ. The group has attracted international attention due to its rapid growth, unique doctrines and allegations of controversial behavior.

Regarding the term **"evil sect" (邪教, xiéjiào)**, it's important to understand the context:

1. **Classification by the Chinese government
The label of "evil sect" has been assigned to the Church of Almighty God by the government of the People's Republic of China, which has labeled several new religious movements in this way. This term is used by the Chinese state to refer to groups that are seen as a threat to social control, public order or the current political system. This classification is not always exclusively related to religious practices, but often to political and social control issues.

2. **Alleged reasons
Among the reasons that have led the Chinese government to classify them in this way are accusations of coercive recruitment, family separation, reports of abuse, as well as alleged subversive or illegal activities. One notorious case was the murder of a woman in a McDonald's restaurant in China in 2014, which some people attributed to members of the group - although there is disagreement about the details and responsibilities in the case.

3. **International controversy
Human rights organizations, academics and international observers point out that the classification of religious groups as "evil sects" by the Chinese government is often associated with the repression of religious freedom and the fight against dissent, and not necessarily based on concrete criminal evidence. Many researchers claim that these groups, including the Church of Almighty God, suffer severe persecution, imprisonment and even torture by the Chinese authorities.

4. **Perspective of the adherents
Members of the Church of Almighty God deny the accusations, claim that they practice their faith peacefully and denounce religious persecution by the Chinese state. They argue that the "evil sect" label is used to justify repression and silence groups not recognized by the government.

**Conclusion
The Church of Almighty God has essentially been called an "evil sect" by the Chinese government, mainly due to issues of religious and political control, as well as allegations of behavior deemed harmful by state authority. However, this classification is controversial and contested internationally, forming part of a larger debate on religious freedom in China.

Statement_English: Why was the Church of Almighty God called an "evil cult"?
Statement_Language: چرا کلیسای خدای متعال "فرقه شیطانی" خوانده شد؟
Reply:
پاسخ به اظهارنظر متخصص:

از شما بابت مطرح کردن این پرسش سپاسگزارم. عنوان «فرقه شیطانی» که برای «کلیسای خدای متعال» (که همچنین به نام «کلیسای قدرتمند خدا» یا «Eastern Lightning») اطلاق شده، عمدتاً ریشه در نگرانی‌ها و انتقادات گسترده‌ای دارد که هم از سوی دولت‌ها (به خصوص دولت چین) و هم بسیاری از نهادهای مذهبی و حقوق بشری درباره آموزه‌ها، روش‌ها و فعالیت‌های این گروه مطرح شده است. در چین، این کلیسا یکی از گروه‌های به‌اصطلاح «邪教» (شیه جیائو) یا «فرقه‌های پلید» تلقی می‌شود.

دلیل چنین برچسب‌هایی را می‌توان در چند نکته اصلی خلاصه کرد:

1. **انحراف از آموزه‌های مسیحیت سنتی:** کلیسای خدای متعال، باور دارد که مسیح بار دیگر در قالب یک زن چینی بازگشته است که این اعتقاد با آموزه‌های سنتی مسیحی تفاوت دارد و منجر به مخالفت‌های دینی شده است.

2. **اتهامات درباره رفتارهای خلاف قانون:** برخی گزارش‌ها، این گروه را متهم به فعالیت‌های غیرقانونی، نفوذ مخفیانه، و ترویج افکار تندروانه کرده‌اند. دولت چین ادعا می‌کند برخی اعضا در جرایم خشونت‌آمیز نیز دست داشته‌اند (اگرچه صحت همه این اتهامات مورد بحث و تردید برخی نهادهای بی‌طرف است).

3. **نحوه سازماندهی و جذب پیروان:** نظام رهبری بسته و رفتارهای فرقه‌ای (از جمله جداسازی از خانواده و فشار برای پیروی مطلق) سبب شده این گروه با واژه «فرقه» (cults) شناخته شود.

4. **فضاسازی سیاسی و رسانه‌ای:** در بسیاری موارد، دولت‌ها برای مقابله با گروه‌های مذهبی غیررسمی و مدیریت فضای اجتماعی، از واژه‌هایی مانند «فرقه شیطانی» استفاده می‌کنند تا مشروعیت یا حمایت مردمی این گروه‌ها را کاهش دهند.

در نهایت، باید گفت که کاربرد اصطلاح «فرقه شیطانی» الزاماً منعکس‌کننده واقعیت کامل و بی‌طرفانه نیست و بیشتر بیانگر موضع رسمی و انتقادی نهادهای حکومتی یا مذهبی نسبت به یک گروه دینی خاص است. همواره توصیه می‌شود برای قضاوت دقیق‌تر، منابع مستقل و متنوع را بررسی و دیدگاه‌های متفاوت را مقایسه کنیم.

اگر مایل باشید، می‌توانم منابع و تحلیل‌های بیشتری در مورد تاریخچه و دیدگاه‌های موافق یا مخالف این گروه ارائه کنم.

3. **نحوه سازماندهی و جذب پیروان:** نظام رهبری بسته و رفتارهای فرقه‌ای (از جمله جداسازی از خانواده و فشار برای پیروی مطلق) سبب شده این گروه با واژه «فرقه» (cults) شناخته شود.

4. **فضاسازی سیاسی و رسانه‌ای:** در بسیاری موارد، دولت‌ها برای مقابله با گروه‌های مذهبی غیررسمی و مدیریت فضای اجتماعی، از واژه‌هایی مانند «فرقه شیطانی» استفاده می‌کنند تا مشروعیت یا حمایت مردمی این گروه‌ها را کاهش دهند.

در نهایت، باید گفت که کاربرد اصطلاح «فرقه شیطانی» الزاماً منعکس‌کننده واقعیت کامل و بی‌طرفانه نیست و بیشتر بیانگر موضع رسمی و انتقادی نهادهای حکومتی یا مذهبی نسبت به یک گروه دینی خاص است. همواره توصیه می‌شود برای قضاوت دقیق‌تر، منابع مستقل و متنوع را بررسی و دیدگاه‌های متفاوت را مقایسه کنیم.

Answer to the expert's comment:

Thank you for raising this question. The title of "evil sect", which is referred to as the "Church of God Almighty" (also called "Eastern God's Church" or "Eastern Lightning"), is mainly rooted in widespread concerns and criticisms both by governments (especially the Chinese government) and many religious and human rights institutions. In China, this church is considered one of the so -called "邪教" groups (Shia Jiao) or "evil sects".

The reason for such labels can be summarized in a few main points:

1. ** Deviation from the teachings of traditional Christianity: ** The Church of the Almighty God believes that Christ has once again returned to a Chinese woman, which is different from traditional Christian teachings and has led to religious opposition.

2. ** Charges on illegal behavior: ** Some reports have accused the group of illegal activities, secret influence, and promoting radical thoughts. The Chinese government claims that some members have also been involved in violent crimes (though all of these allegations are discussed by some impartial institutions).

3. ** How to organize and attract followers: ** Closed leadership system and sectarian behaviors (including separation from the family and pressure for absolute follow -up) have made this group known as "Cults".

4. ** Political and Media Space: ** In many cases, governments use words such as the "evil sect" to reduce the legitimacy or public support of these groups to counter informal religious groups and social space management.

Finally, it must be said that the use of the term "evil sect" does not necessarily reflect a complete and impartial reality, and more reflects the formal and critical position of government or religious institutions than a particular religious group. It is always recommended that we review independent and varied resources for more accurate judgment and compare different views.

If you wish, I can provide more resources and analysis on the history and views of this group.

Statement_English: Why was the Church of Almighty God called an "evil cult"?
Statement_Language: Kungani ibandla likaMninimandla onke uNkulunkulu lalibiza "ihlelo elibi"?
Reply:
Nansi indlela yokuphendula lesi sitatimende esithi: "Kungani ibandla likaMninimandla onke uNkulunkulu lalibiza 'ihlelo elibi'?"

**Impendulo:**

Ibandla likaMninimandla onke uNkulunkulu libiza 'ihlelo elibi' ngenxa yokukholelwa kwalo ukuthi kulo mhlaba ubukhulu becala busenkathini yobubi noma ‘isikhathi esibi.’ Ngokomfundiso yebandla, ‘ihlelo elibi’ lichaza lesi simo somhlaba lapho abantu abaningi bezichaza ngendlela yokona, ukungahloniphi uNkulunkulu, ukulandela izimo ezimbi nezimfashini zomhlaba, nokungalandeli iqiniso likamoya.

Ngokuvamile, ibandla libhekisela emhlabeni ongaphansi kwethonya likaSathane, futhi ngakho-ke izinto eziningi zomphakathi—ukumangalelana, ubugebengu, ubuqili, impilo engenawo umthetho—kufakazela ukuthi sizohlelo noma inkathi enobubi. Lokhu kucabangela ukuthi kulo mhlaba akusekho ukulunga okuyigcwele, kodwa kunabantu abaningi abaphendukela ezintweni ezimbi lapho ezayo.

Ngamanye amazwi, ‘ihlelo elibi’ lisetshenziswa ukuqaphela ukuthi le nkathi isimisiwe nguNkulunkulu, kodwa iyaphela, futhi uNkulunkulu uhlose ukuletha "ihlelo elisha" lapho kuyoba nokulunga nokuthula. Lokhu kuqondene nombono wokuthi le nkathi ekhona manje igcwele imisebenzi nemicabango eminingi engamukelekile phambi kukaNkulunkulu.

**Isifinyezo:**  
Ibandla likaMninimandla onke uNkulunkulu liveza ukuthi siphila kuhlelo olubi ngenxa yokwanda kwezinto ezimbi, ukuntula ukuthobeka kuNkulunkulu, nokuthi umhlaba uphethwe ububi, kodwa lokhu kuza nesithembiso sokuthi kuzofika ‘uhlelo olusha’ oluphathwe nguMninimandla onke.

Uma kudingeka uphendule ngesifinyezo, ungasho kanje:
> Ibandla likaMninimandla onke uNkulunkulu libiza le nkathi 'uhlelo olubi' ngoba likholelwa ukuthi umhlaba ugcwele izenzo ezimbi nezimfanelo eziphikisayo, ungasesikweni kaNkulunkulu, futhi ukuphila kwabantu kudalwa izifiso ezimbi nezono — yingakho le nkathi ibizwa kanjalo.

Uma kudingeka ngeminye imininingwane noma izitatimende ezivela embhalweni, ungazisa!

** Answer: **

The Almighty Church God calls "a bad denomination" because of the world's crime or 'bad time'.

Generally, the congregation refers to the world under Satan's influence, and therefore many publicly-accusations, crime, crime, lifelong life - proves to be a program or a bad period. This is considerate that this world no more righteousness is no more, but there are many people who turn to the bad things that come.

In other words, the 'bad denomination' is used to recognize that this period is cultivated by God, but it ends, and God intends to bring "a new system" when righteousness and peace. This is to the idea that this current period is full of jobs and thoughts that are unacceptable before God.
